Uses of Package
fluent.ly

  • Packages that use fluent.ly 
    Package Description
    fluent.ly  
    il.org.spartan.utils  
  • Classes in fluent.ly used by fluent.ly 
    Class Description
    ___.Bug
    The base of all exception classes thrown as a result of violations of contracts, assertions, and the such.
    ___.Bug.Assertion
    This is the root of all assertion related exceptions, including contract violations.
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Invariant
    Thrown in case a class invariant was violated.
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Reachability
    Thrown in case execution reached code that should never be executed
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Value
    Abstract base class of all exceptions thrown in case a value violated a condition placed on it.
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Value.NotNullValue
    Thrown in case a value was null, when it was expected to be non-code>null.
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Value.Numerical
    Abstract base class of exceptions thrown when a numerical value did not satisfy conditions assumed on it.
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Value.Numerical.Negative
    Thrown when a numerical value assumed to be negative, was not.
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Value.Numerical.NonNan
    Thrown when a numerical value assumed to be non-NaN, but it was not
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Value.Numerical.NonNegative
    Thrown when a numerical value assumed to be non-negative, was not.
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Value.Numerical.NonPositive  
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Value.Numerical.Positive
    Thrown when a numerical value assumed to be positive, was not.
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Variant
    Abstract base class of exceptions thrown when a loop variant failed.
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Variant.Initial
    Thrown when the initial value of a loop variant was negative.
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Variant.Nondecreasing
    Thrown if an iteration of a certain loop failed to decrease this loop's variant.
    ___.Bug.Assertion.Variant.Underflow
    Thrown if an iteration of a certain loop tried to make this loop's variant negative.
    ___.Bug.Contract
    Abstract base class of contract (pre- and post-condition) violations
    ___.Bug.Contract.Postcondition
    Thrown in case a post-condition was not satisfied
    ___.Bug.Contract.Precondition
    Thrown in case a pre-condition was not satisfied
    ___.Invariantable
    An interface representing a class with an invariant.
    ¢
    Short name of JohnDoe parameter
    accumulate  
    all
    A utility class to realize universally quantified checks of an entire collection.
    as
    A collection of static functions for converting from one aggregate type to another.
    azzert.Asserter  
    box
    A utility class, with a collection of function to box primitive types in their reference type equivalent representation.
    de.To  
    defaults
    A bunch of static functions to manage the frequent conditional of replacing a null value with some default.
    empty
    TODO Yossi Gil: document class
    English.Inflection  
    Example  
    has
    A collection of static functions for converting from one aggregate type to another.
    idiomatic.Holder
    Supplier with idiomatic.Holder.when(boolean) method
    idiomatic.Producer
    A class which is just like Supplier , except that it uses the shorter name ( idiomatic.Producer.λ() and that it allows for Exception s to be thrown by the getters.
    idiomatic.Runner
    Evaluate a Runnable when a condition applies or unless a condition applies.
    idiomatic.Storer
    Store a value to be returned with idiomatic.Storer.get() function
    idiomatic.Trigger  
    lazy
    A class for lazy, memoizing evaluation of objects of arbitrary type.
    list.Operator  
    list.Operators  
    list.PrependOrAppend  
    list.ToCallExpected  
    maybe  
    nil.On  
    NullReduce
    Provides null value for NullReduce.reduce()
    prune
    A Utility class providing functions to remove null elements from arrays and iterable collections.
    PureIterable
    A kind of Iterable which does not permit the rarely used Iterator#remove operation and saves the user, i.e., whoever chooses to implements this class, the trouble of providing a vacuous implementation of this function.
    range.AfterTo  
    range.BeforeTo  
    range.Infinite  
    Reduce
    An abstract reducer of an associative, but not necessarily commutative operation.
    safe  
    Selfie
    TODO Yossi Gil: document class
    separate
    A utility class providing library functions that take an array or a collection, and return a String composed by the elements of this collection, separated by a given String or char.
    separate.SeparationSubject
    Auxiliary class for fluent API.
    string
    A bunch of string functions.
    unbox
    A utility class, offering a collection of function to unbox arrays and collection of the boxed versions of the primitive types.
